description: Ministry of Labour, Trade Union Relation  and Sabaragamuwa Development - Appoint Mr. T. Piyasoma at the arbitrator of the settlement of Industrial dispute between Free Trade Zone & General Services Employees Union Col. 10 and ATG Ceylon (Pvt.) Ltd. Katunayaka - appoint N. Bedigama at the arbitrator of the Settlement of Industrial dispute between H. K. Nimal R. G. 4, Moratuwa and State Engineering Corporation of Sri Lanka Col. 02
